attributes.action: ban broadcasters from charging viewers to watch our national teams.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sporting events that feature our national teams should be available to view live on 'Free to View' television.

In a short time every one will have access to digital television.  There will be enough channels available for this to happen without the schedules of the five 'terrestial' channels being messed around.

Charging to view matches will result in fewer viewers and fewer people being interested in those sports.  This will create a downward spiral of interest in sport in general.

The management of the variopus spaorts have been greedy in accepting over inflated payments from televesion companies so that those companies can make even larger profits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
